sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Text, View, FlatList, Image } from 'react-native';

// Hàm render mỗi mục trong FlatList
const ChatItem = ({ item }) => (
    <View>
      <View style={{height:80, flexDirection:'row', marginHorizontal:10, alignItems: 'center'}}>
         <Image source={{ uri: item.url }} style={{width:55, height:55, borderRadius:25}}/>
         <View style={{flex:1}}>
          <View style={{flexDirection:'row', marginStart: 10, justifyContent: 'space-between',marginBottom:10 }}>
          <Text style={{fontSize:20}}>{item.ten}</Text>
          <Text>{item.thoiGian} phút</Text>
          </View>
          <View style={{flexDirection:'row', marginStart:10, justifyContent: 'space-between'}}>
          <Text style={{fontSize:16, opacity:0.5}}>{item.tinNhan}</Text>
          <Text style={{backgroundColor:'red', width:20, height:20,textAlign:'center', borderRadius:25}}>{item.soTNChuaDoc}</Text>
          </View>
         </View>
    </View>
    <View style={{height: 1, backgroundColor:'gray', marginStart: 75}}/>
    </View>
    
  );

export default ChatItem
